DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To evaluate potential hydratation renewal mucosa , corneometry measurement individual questionnaire perception . Secondary Objective : To evaluate safety normal condition use .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Safety Efficacy Evaluation Between Dermacyd Silver Glycerine Vegetal Soap Granado Traditional
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Active sex life Menopause least 6 month Perfect mucosa evaluate area Use cosmetic category Exclusion criterion : Use antiinflammatory / immunosuppression / antihistaminic drug Personal history atopy cosmetic product Cutaneous active disease ( local and/or general ) evaluate area Disease cause immunosuppression , diabetes , HIV Endocrine pathology thyroid disease , ovarian disorder adrenal gland Intense solar exposure ( get tan ) 15 day evaluation Gynaecologic treatment four week evaluation Whatever vaginal infection detect time inclusion Other condition consider investigator reasonable exclude patient study The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
